import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { IProduct } from 'src/app/models/products'; @Component({ selector: 'Product', templateUrl: './product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product.component.scss'], }) export class ProductComponent { @Input() product: IProduct; details: boolean = false; }
